moduleMetadataJson.name: MiniUPnPd 1.4 Denial of Service (DoS) Exploit
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (DoS)
          in MiniUPnP 1.0 server via a specifically crafted UDP request.
author: hdm <x@hdm.io>
Dejan Lukan

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: RHOSTS
options.description: The target host(s), range CIDR identifier, or hosts file with syntax 'file:<path>'

options.name: ATTEMPTS
options.description: Max number of attempts to DoS the remote MiniUPnP ending
